# llmstxt.org/1.0
name: RAGDiff
short-description: Domain-based framework for comparing retrieval-augmented generation systems with LLM-assisted evaluation.
primary-language: Python
license: MIT
source-repository: https://github.com/ansari-project/ragdiff
support: https://github.com/ansari-project/ragdiff/issues
full-profile: llms-full.txt
